title: How to Learn CSS
content:
How to Learn CSS

  • Understand Selectors: Learn about element, class, and ID selectors.
  • Work with Box Model: Understand padding, margin, and border.
  • Master Flexbox and Grid: Learn how to create responsive layouts.
  • Use Media Queries: Make your designs mobile-friendly.
  • Learn CSS Variables: Store and reuse values efficiently.
  • Understand Animations: Work with transitions and keyframes.
  • Practice with Projects: Build landing pages and UI components.
  • Explore CSS Frameworks: Use Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS for rapid development.
